We build, we deploy, everything works smoothly, but when we try to control it with the controller, all inputs affect only forward/backward motion on the motors. Normally the thumbsticks would control the forward/backward as well as the turning, but they’re all just controlling forward/backward. Any help would be appreciated, thanks.
